question:
The BASIC countries called for wider ratification of the Doha Amendment in October. In this context, consider the following statements about this amendment:
  1. It amends the Doha Declaration.
  2. India has accepted the Doha Amendment.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Doha Amendment is an amendment of the Kyoto Protocol. It is the second commitment period of the protocol and it seeks to reduce the green-house gas emission. This amendment was adopted in 2012 and is applicable for the period between 2013 and 2020. Statement 2 is correct: India had accepted the Doha Amendment of Kyoto Protocol in August of 2019. India is the 80th country to do so. It submitted the instrument of acceptance and along with the other BASIC countries urged all the other parties to adopt the amendment as soon as possible.
